(Armor Negating [armornegating], Shock [shock], Magic weapon [magic], Strength not added to damage [nostr])

Requires 10S to forge (S2)

The vajra, the diamond thunderbolt, is the weapon of the gods. Forged in the likeness of the celestial god-weapon by the sages of the monkey people, a vajra can project lightning upon the enemies of its wielder. It also protects its wielder from lightning.
